description_for_human: Decentralized web proxy network designed for censorship resistance, high availability. Deploy nodes on Vercel, Railway, Cloudflare Workers in seconds.  Use community-maintained public nodes. Features automatic failover between nodes, <50ms edge latency, built-in health monitoring, full compatibility with Ultraviolet, other TompHTTP clients.
